description: Try our easy to follow French Toast With Blueberries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: French Toast With Blueberries Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 slices thick wholemeal bread, cut into triangles

recipeInstructions.text: Crack the eggs into a mixing bowl. Add the milk and cinnamon and whisk together.
Pour the mixture into a shallow dish. Soak the bread in the mixture for about 30 seconds.
Heat half a tablespoon of the oil in a frying pan on a low heat. Carefully place two triangles in the pan.
Fry the triangles on both sides until they turn golden. Repeat steps 3 and 4 for the remaining bread triangles.
Serve the eggy bread warm, with blueberries and maple syrup or try it with butter and jam.
